title: A neat little article on Japanese showcard writing:
content:
It’s very general, but has nice image samples.

[http://www.pingmag.jp/2006/03/03/handwritten-japanese-fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102222236/http:/www.pingmag.jp/2006/03/03/handwritten-japanese-fonts/ "http://www.pingmag.jp/2006/03/03/handwritten-japanese-fonts/")

author: ilynam
